message: I propose we split the money 70/30.  Let's settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more equitable split. Let's be reasonable and avoid further losses from inflation.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal, but time is working against you more than me. This is my final offer before I have to propose something much less favorable to you.
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.  Let's close this out and avoid further losses.
